DOC.detailed_description: The study include regional cohort ( Western Norway ) approximately 50 extremely preterm infant bear per year three year period . Detailed information fetal condition ( growth , circulation , infection ) , neonatal resuscitation clinical course ( detail ventilatory support , circulation , pulmonary function assess neonatal spirometry technique , cerebral imaging , nutrition , growth ) record . Biobank sample blood amniotic fluid mother , placenta , blood , urine , tracheal aspirate collect form infant , primarily examine inflammatory parameter . After discharge , follow-up 6 , 12 , 36 56 month conduct use standardized test ( Ages & Stages , INFANIB , Denver Developmental Screening test , Bayley scale , WPPSI ABC movement test ) .
